admin.title: Admin
admin.description: Represents a user with administrative privileges.

userId.description: The UID of the admin user.

score.title: Score
score.description: Represents a score entry for the quiz.

userId.description: The ID of the user who achieved the score.

score.description: The score achieved by the player.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the score was submitted.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

badges.description: An array of badges earned by the user.

momoNumber.description: The user's MTN MoMo number for receiving payments.

consecutiveWeeksPlayed.description: The number of consecutive weeks the user has played.

lastPlayTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the last time the user played.

hasCompletedOnboarding.description: Whether the user has completed the onboarding tour.

isSuspended.description: Whether the user's account is suspended.

paymentTransaction.title: Payment Transaction
paymentTransaction.description: Represents a manual payment transaction submitted by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the payment.

playerName.description: The display name of the user who made the payment.

momoTransactionId.description: The MTN MoMo transaction ID provided by the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the payment proof was submitted.

screenshotUrl.description: Data URI of the uploaded screenshot for payment proof.

entryType.description: The method used for the entry fee.

prizePool.title: Prize Pool
prizePool.description: Represents the total prize pool for a given week.

total.description: The total amount in the prize pool.

startDate.description: The start date of the week for this prize pool.

/admins/{adminId}.description: Stores a list of user UIDs that have admin privileges.

/scores/{scoreId}.description: Stores quiz scores for the leaderboard.

/users/{userId}/payment-transactions/{tr.description: Stores user-submitted payment transactions for a specific user.
